description: we should remove the detail method from the LimitsController class because the detail is not the default method and it doesn't add the detail  operation in the _setup_routes method from the class APIRouter
title: remove detail method from the LimitsController class

comments.content: we should remove the detail method from the LimitsController class because the detail is not the default method and it doesn't add the detail  operation in the _setup_routes method from the class APIRouter
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhangchunlong1

comments.content: The detail method is not used in OpenStack, and is not a default method as described at https://routes.readthedocs.org/en/latest/restful.html so this looks like dead code.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~matthew-gilliard-u

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

commit 41d721c06e12492f77a49e07e032f7908bba8153
Author: zhangchunlong <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Dec 17 23:08:45 2014 +0800

    remove detail method from LimitsController
    
    we should remove the detail method from the LimitsController class
    because the detail is not the default method and it doesn't add the
    detail operation in the _setup_routes method from the class APIRouter
    
    Change-Id: I7944f5d3b43433093d76d2925eaf0568c68d4a49
    Closes-Bug: #1403441
